author: reschke
msg: JCR-3554: RepositoryService.getReferences needs to deal with absolute paths in hrefs

author: desruisseaux
msg: Added copy constructor in every metadata class. The cost in JAR file size is approximatively 7 kb.
We paid that cost because invoking virtual methods using Java reflection at object construction time
is unsafe. Furthermore the copy constructor may be invoked more often than other operation, because
JAXB wants an annotated implementation class at marshalling time.
